question: What is the purpose of the provided link in the text?
answer: The provided link https://github.com/facebookresearch/detectron2/issues/new/choose is meant to direct users to select an appropriate issue template before submitting an issue.

question: What will happen if an issue is submitted without using the provided issue template link?
answer: If an issue is submitted without using the provided issue template link, the issue will be closed.
